p: The cell viability under tested compound addition was assessed by CellTiter-Glo Luminescent Cell Viability Assay (Promega, San Luis Obispo, CA, USA) according to the manufacturerâ€™s protocol as described previously [ 31]. The luminescent signal was measured using the Envison 2102 Multilabel Reader (Perkin Elmer). The 50% cytotoxic concentration (CC 50) for each compound was calculated from these dose-response curves using Graphpad5.0 Prism.
